original_text: On that day, the Lord made a covenant with Abram. The Lord promised, ‘I give this land to your descendants. The land starts from the river of Egypt and continues as far as the River Euphrates.
korean_text: 그 날에 여호와께서 아브람과 더불어 언약을 세워 이르시되 내가 이 땅을 애굽 강에서부터 그 큰 강 유브라데까지 네 자손에게 주노니

sentences.original_text: the Lord made a covenant with Abram
I give this land to your descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 땅을 네 자손에게 주노라

sentences.original_text: The land starts from the river of Egypt
and continues as far as the River Euphrates
